description_for_human: Learn machine learning by building algorithms from scratch. Practice hands-on coding problems with Python running in your browser.
description_for_model: ML Coding Lab is an interactive educational platform for learning machine learning through hands-on coding. It covers NumPy fundamentals, neural networks, CNNs, transformers, VAEs, diffusion models, and more. Users write Python code that runs directly in the browser via Pyodide (WebAssembly). The platform has 55+ problems across 14 sections organized in 5 parts: Foundations, Data, Classical ML, Deep Learning, and Capstone. For detailed content information, see /llms.txt or /llms-full.txt.

api.info: This is a static educational website, not an API. See /llms-full.txt for complete content documentation.
